name: The Princess of Vestria - BETA
description:
Inspired by a dream to take action to save your seriously ill brother, you must escape the palace and embark on a quest of danger and discovery that will be the making of a queen. Will you be diplomatic or devious, kind or ruthless? Will you succeed or fail? Your choices will shape the character of the future Queen and with it, the fate of a whole kingdom...

The Princess of Vestria is a consequence-heavy interactive adventure made using Twine.

This is a beta version, free to play. There may be a few remaining bugs - hopefully minor. Feedback is welcome and appreciated! Message me or reply in the comments 🙏🏾
